verses.roman:
yāre tāṅra kṛpā, sei jānibāre pāre
kṛpā vinā brahmādika jānibāre nāre

synonyms: yāre—upon whom; tāṅra—His; kṛpā—mercy; sei—that person; jānibāre—to know; pāre—is able; kṛpā—mercy; vinā—without; brahma-ādika—the demigods, headed by Lord Brahmā; jānibāre—to know; nāre—are not able.
translation: Only a person who has received the mercy of the Lord can understand. Without the Lord's mercy, even the demigods, headed by Lord Brahmā, cannot understand.
